short_summary: Request for Apple products equivalent to meet  indigenous Services Canada requriements
description: Indigenous Services Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one hundred and eight (108) 10.2-inch iPad MK2K3VC/A or equivalent and thirty-three (33) 13-inch MacBook Air MGN63LL/A or equivalent as per the Statement of Requirement and the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation.,
full_summary:
### Solicitation for Apple Products or Equivalent for Indigenous Services Canada
#### Solicitation Number: BPM020418/24970

#### Notice Type:
This notice has been issued by the Shared Services Canada on behalf of Indigenous Services Canada for the supply and delivery of Apple products or their equivalent.

#### Background:
The `Statement of Requirement` and `List of Deliverables` outline the scope of the project and the expected outcomes.

#### Objective:
* Provide 108 x 10.2-inch iPad or equivalent devices
* Provide 33 x 13-inch MacBook Air devices or equivalent
* Deliver the devices to Ohsweken, Ontario
* The delivery date shall be within 90 working days from contract award

#### Evaluation Criteria:
The evaluation shall be based on the responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price.

#### Terms and Conditions:
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate the terms and conditions with the selected supplier.
* All documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information:
To access the solicitation and submit your bid, please visit the following link:
https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login

For A/P procurement officer, you should contact:
Sebastien Darif
Procurement Officer, Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor
PO Box/CP 9808 STS T CSC
Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2N1
Phone: (613) 866-5465
Email: Sebastienmajd.darif@ssc-spc.gc.ca



Attachments:
